TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Someone installed a 3D printed gun in the programming though, and once it is done you are shot and killed.

I wish that this wish never gets granted.

Granted, but the wish is nullified and you are imprisoned for clear violation of the rules.

I wish people would read the OP at least once in a while.

Granted, but the wish is nullified and you are imprisoned for clear violation of the rules.

I wish people would read the OP at least once in a while.

Granted, but they don't read the OP for this post.

I wish that I knew of a wish that was difficult to corrupt.

Granted, but in accordance with the rules, you can never use it.

I wish the next person would be a moderator.

Granted, but the moderator is a lie

I wish the cake was not a lie

Granted, but you can't have any.

I wish for my own space station.

Granted. It is not in an orbital path, and the parts surviving re-entry will land on your house. You are either trapped in your space station or your house. Good luck!

I wish that there were no restrictions on wishes.

Granted, but you are then frozen for eternity while we attempt to clean up the awful mess you made.

I wish the next person would give me a weapon.

Granted. The influx of inappropriate wishes causes the thread to get locked.

I wish for a soft, cuddly Fluttershy plushie.

Granted. The influx of inappropriate wishes causes the thread to get locked.

I wish for a soft, cuddly Fluttershy plushie.

Granted, but it is so soft that when touched it falls apart permanently.

I wish that a spooky skeleton would jump out in front of vexx32.

Granted, but it's only my puppet, which I use to store the souls of the unfortunate.

I wish people would fall into my trap.

Granted. The people who do so are invincible, and can escape the trap via flying, walking through walls, and teleportation. They also have body armor which prevents soul stealing, and any number of super-powers which they can use to kill you.

I wish for unpoisoned cream soda.

Granted. It is served to you with mentos as the secret ingredient providing the fizz, and you explode after drinking it from the resulting gas production.

I wish I had a Linux supercomputer

Granted, but it is equivalent in specs to a supercomputer from 1986.

I wish for food.

Granted, but it has 100 computer-killing viruses. EDIT: Ninja'd, read below

Granted, but it is disgusting food.

I wish 340939090439043904309340943 mods on one directory would work.

Granted, it requires 10 zettabytes of RAM and a 2 zettahertz processor.

I wish for by wishes to be uncorruptable.

Granted. This wish will be not corruptable and permanent.

I wish for everything to turn into a kerbal.

Edited January 13, 2014 by KittyProgram

Wanting it won't get you it, you need to WISH for it.

EDIT: The universe becomes a kerbal, which has no universe to exist in. Thus, everything ceases to exist.

I wish KittyProgram had wished instead of just stating a "want"

Edited January 13, 2014 by Noname117

Granted, but nobody else understands what you mean. That's what happens when you rewrite time.

I wish for mayonnaise.

Granted. It is perfect mayonaise with no flaws.

I wish for something with no flaws.

Granted, it exists only in the 4th dimension.

I wish.

Granted, but you don't.

I wish for a Tribble! *Cooo*

Edited January 14, 2014 by Boosterspice
Reaction image snip.

Granted, but this one has razor-sharp fur all over it.

I wish for a phaser.

Granted, but you get the dude from N-Dubz!

I wish for a black hole to pass through our solar system.

Congratz.

What happens is what you expect. Everyone dies.

I wish for a manned mission to Mars and stable NASA funding.
